name: Umpire Simulator
description: Umpire Simulator gives you the MLB umpire experience, making tough calls at 75-105 mph. Supports all VR headsets, and also Non-VR play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidea GeForce 960 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
